guide.introduction: In this project i will hopefully show you how to build your own CNC Router. It vil be run by an arudino, and consist of cheep and easy parts.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this project i will hopefully show you how to build your own CNC Router. It vil be run by an arudino, and consist of cheep and easy parts.

Relevant parts
  • Bipolar stepper driver/motor combo
  • Plywood
Tools
  • Phillips head screwdriver
  • Saw

lines.text: I used a program called T-FLEX cad to deisgn my project, it's a easy to learn powerful 3d cad design tool. It comes whit great tutorials both in writhing and in video. You can get a free student edition at their web site.
lines.text_raw: I used a program called T-FLEX cad to deisgn my project, it's a easy to learn powerful 3d cad design tool. It comes whit great tutorials both in writhing and in video. You can get a free student edition at their web site.

guide.summary: Learn how to build your own CNC router, whit custom software and cheep harwear.
guide.title: Easy Arduino CNC Router
